pronunciationrecording-toolbar-record-la:
Label text for the button to start recording.
{{Identical|Record}}
pronunciationrecording-toolbar-stop-labe:
Label text for the button to stop recording.
{{Identical|Stop}}
pronunciationrecording-toolbar-clear-lab:
Label text for the button to clear the recording.
{{Identical|Clear}}
pronunciationrecording-toolbar-upload-la:
Label text for the button to upload the recording.
{{Identical|Upload}}
pronunciationrecording-webaudio-not-supp: Used as an error message when the WebAudio API is not supported by the browser.
pronunciationrecording-specialpage-error:
Error shown when user is not logged in.

Parameters:
* $1 - URL of login page, with return pointing to [[Special:PronunciationRecording]]
pronunciationrecording-upload-publish-su:
Used as a message when the recording is successfully uploaded from the stash.

Followed by " " and a link pointing to the file.

See also:
* {{msg-mw|Pronunciationrecording-upload-publish-failed}}
pronunciationrecording-information-word-:
Label text for the word input field.
{{Identical|Word}}
pronunciationrecording-information-langu:
Label text for the language dropdown list.
{{Identical|Language}}
pronunciationrecording-mic-access-notify: Notifies the user to click "Allow" to allow the browser to get microphone access
pronunciationrecording-recording-notify: Notifies the user that his pronunciation is being recorded
pronunciationrecording-information-licen:
Text prompting the user about the license. It is the below the language drop down list.

Refers to {{msg-mw|Pronunciationrecording-toolbar-upload-label}}.

Parameters:
* $1 - username, for GENDER support
